pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automated Functions for Basic Statistical Tests // Provides simple and intuitive functions for basic statistical analyses. Methods include the t-test (Student 1908 doi:10.1093/biomet/6.1.1), the Mann-Whitney U test (Mann and Whitney 1947 doi:10.1214/aoms/1177730491), Pearson's correlation (Pearson 1895 doi:10.1098/rspl.1895.0041), and analysis of variance (Fisher 1925, doi:10.1007/978-1-4612-4380-9_5). Functions are compatible with 'ggplot2' and 'dplyr'.
